title: Great Smoky Mountains National Park: News
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     News             News       Great Smoky Mountains National Park strives to keep the public informed about news events which occur within the park by providing press releases to local and regional news providers, and by posting current news releases on this web site. If you are a member of the media, please contact our Public Affairs Office for additional information. Up-to-date information about temporary road and facility closures due to weather is available by calling (865) 436-1200.
